```{r, load-libs, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr) 
library(tidyr)
library(gt)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)
```

```{r, load-table, echo=F, message=F}
# Load table
os_table <- read_csv(here("data", "os_data.csv"))
```


```{r, add-entry, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# Add new entries
new_entry <- tibble(
  Authors = "Rasanen, Doyle and Frank", 
  Year = 2017, 
  Title = "Pre-linguistic segmentation of speech into syllable-like units", 
  Journal = "Cognition", 
  `Data available` = 1, 
  `Code available` = 1, 
  Notes = "Are syllable-like structures available to infants before phonological development?", 
  Links = "[article](https://psyarxiv.com/cfy9r/)  [code](https://osf.io/86wmj/)", 
  Citation = "Räsänen, O., Doyle, G., & Frank, M. C. (2017, October 23). Pre-linguistic segmentation of speech into syllable-like units. https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/cfy9r"
) %>% 
  write_csv(., here("data", "os_data.csv"), append = TRUE)
```


```{r, create-table, echo=F}
# Create GT table (not working w/ github)
os_table %>% 
  select(., Citation, `Data available`, `Code available`, Notes, Links) %>% 
  kable(., format = "markdown") %>% 
  #kable_styling(., position = "center", font_size = 9, 
  #                 bootstrap_options = "striped") %>% 
  {.}
```
